languages.text: {n}Сервитор наклоняет голову набок совсем человеческим жестом.{/n} "Номос не доставят неприятностей. Номос просто хотят быть. Познавать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Сервитор наклоняет голову на бок совсем человеческим жестом.{/n} "Номос не доставят неприятностей. Номос просто хотят быть. Познавать".

languages.text: {n}The servitor cocks its head just like a human being would.{/n} "Nomos will not cause trouble. Nomos simply want to be. And learn."

{n}The servitor cocks its head just like a human being would.{/n} "Nomos will not cause trouble. Nomos simply want to be. And learn."

languages.text: {n}Le servitor penche la tête à la manière d'un être humain.{/n} « Nous ne causerons pas d'ennuis. Nous voulons simplement exister... et apprendre. »
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor cocks its head just like a human being would.{/n} "Nomos will not cause trouble. Nomos simply want to be. And learn."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le servitor penche la tête à la manière d'un être humain.{/n} « Nous ne causerons pas d'ennuis. Nous voulons simplement exister... et apprendre. »

languages.text: {n}机仆像人类一样昂起了头。{/n}“诺莫斯不会制造麻烦。诺莫斯只想存在，学习一切。”
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor cocks its head just like a human being would.{/n} "Nomos will not cause trouble. Nomos simply want to be. And learn."

traits.locale_text: {n}奴工像人类一样昂起了头。{/n}“诺莫斯不会制造麻烦。诺莫斯只想存在，学习一切。”

languages.text: {n}Der Servitor legt den Kopf schief, wie ein Mensch es tun würde.{/n} "Nomos werden keinen Ärger bereiten. Nomos wollen einfach nur sein. Und lernen."
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor cocks its head just like a human being would.{/n} "Nomos will not cause trouble. Nomos simply want to be. And learn."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Servitor legt den Kopf schief, wie ein Mensch es tun würde.{/n} "Nomos werden keinen Ärger bereiten. Nomos wollen einfach nur sein. Und lernen."

languages.text: {n}El servidor ladea la cabeza como lo haría un ser humano.{/n} «Nomos no causará problemas. Nomos solo quiere estar. Y aprender».
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor cocks its head just like a human being would.{/n} "Nomos will not cause trouble. Nomos simply want to be. And learn."

traits.locale_text: {n}El servidor ladea la cabeza como lo haría un ser humano.{/n} «Nomos no causará problemas. Nomos solo quiere estar. Y aprender».

languages.text: {n}サーヴィターは人間のように首を傾げた。{/n}「ノモスは問題は起こさない。ノモスは、ただここにいて、学びたいだけだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor cocks its head just like a human being would.{/n} "Nomos will not cause trouble. Nomos simply want to be. And learn."

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴィターは人間のように首を傾げた。{/n}「ノモスは問題は起こさない。ノモスは、ただここにいて、学びたいだけだ」

languages.text: {n}Hizmetör, tıpkı bir insan gibi kafasını sallıyor.{/n} "Nomos sorun çıkarmayacak. Nomos yalnızca olmak ve öğrenmek istiyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor cocks its head just like a human being would.{/n} "Nomos will not cause trouble. Nomos simply want to be. And learn."

traits.locale_text: {n}Servitör, tıpkı bir insan gibi kafasını sallıyor.{/n} "Nomos sorun çıkarmayacak. Nomos yalnızca olmak ve öğrenmek istiyor."
